title: I got banned for spamming for 14 days?
body: So, i played a game in the evening today and there was a guy blaming me while it wasnt ranked. He was saying i was feeding while i was standing: 1 / 2 / 2 and he was 0 / 7 /5 and then he was just keep on going with the trashtalk. So i was spamming his score.  Later the night i tried to play a game with my friends but i couldnt click on play. Then something pops up on the screen called `` 14 days banned `` And now im here. I got 14 days banned for spamming? Is this normal?{{champion:74}}
